de.zabuza.soundEngine.mixer

Class ListenerMixer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.zabuza.soundEngine.mixer.ListenerMixer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StereoSoundProducer

    public class ListenerMixer
extends java.lang.Object
implements StereoSoundProducer
    Organisates all sounds which should be played. Produces the stereo sound out of mono sounds.
    Author:
    Zabuza

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ListenerMixer(int thatMaxChannels)
      Create a new ListenerMixer with a maximum amount of sound channels.

      Reads the next sounds in the left and right stereo buffers with a reading rate.
      void setSoundListener(SoundListener thatSoundListener)
      Sets the SoundListener of the ListenerMixer.
      void skip(int samplesToSkip, int readRate)
      Skips samples with a reading rate.
      void update()
      Updates all sounds and removes the sounds which are not alive anymore.
